description: This file defines the SearchService class which provides database search functionality over documents, allowing filtering by various attributes such as title, category, tags, and OCR text from the latest document version.

classes.name: SearchService
classes.description: A service class providing methods to search documents in the database based on various filters.

methods.name: List[Document] search_documents(self, user_id: int, query: Optional[str] = None, category: Optional[str] = None, tag: Optional[str] = None, limit: int = 25, offset: int = 0)
methods.description: Searches documents belonging to a specific user, with optional filtering by query, category, and tags, and supports pagination.

ctags.name: search_documents
ctags.pattern: /^    def search_documents(self, user_id: int, query: Optional[str] = None, category: Optional[str/
ctags.signature: (self, user_id: int, query: Optional[str] = None, category: Optional[str] = None, tag: Optional[str] = None, limit: int = 25, offset: int = 0)
